greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Third convolution of A115140.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1668
formula: O.g.f.: 1/c(x)^3 = P(4, x) - x*P(3, x)*c(x) with the o.g.f. c(x):=(1-sqrt(1-4*x))/(2*x) of A000108 (Catalan numbers) and the polynomials P(n, x) defined in A115139. Here P(4, x)=1-2*x and P(3, x)=1-x.

a(n) = -C3(n-3), n >= 3, with C3(n):= A000245(n+1) (third convolution of Catalan numbers). a(0)=1, a(1)=-3, a(2)=0. [1, -3] is the row n=3 of signed A034807 (signed Lucas polynomials). See A115149 and A034807 for comments.
program: (MAGMA) m:=30; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); Coefficients(R!( (2*(1-2*x)-(1-x)*(1-Sqrt(1-4*x)))/2 )); // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 12 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jan 13 2006
